Dialogue: I see you're still working on your paper flower.
Mmhm~ I have so much to say, but I can’t decide where to begin.
I’m sure you can find a middle grown. Or should I bring you more paper?
Heh. Oh you~ By the way Professor have you noticed how this place has changed?
Hm? What do you mean?
I mean for the better. The last couple of weeks leading up to the festival, the island has become cleaner. I’ve noticed less litter whenever I’m out for a run.
Well you’re not wrong, it makes the festival feel more put together.
Yeah…last year was such a mess. There was so much garbage. I’m surprised so many people came back this year.
Yeah…but it wasn't a total mess. Your music made it worth it.
Wait really?
Are you kidding? Your voice and the way you played your guitar was really something. The contest couldn't hold a candle to your performance.
I didn’t think it was that good, but I’m happy to hear that especially from you.
Of course!
I was a bit bummed out that I couldn't perform again this year, but I guess they really wanted to focus more on that flower contest.
Well I don’t mind listening to you sing some time in the future.
Oh my! I’m so hype to play for you I just want to scream right now!!! AAAAAAAAAA!!!
Heh well save your voice for the singing.
Oh jeez…
Sylv? Are you alright?
I just need a few to collect myself, don't worry about me. I should  just focus on my flower.
